name: üßë‚Äçüéì Testez vos comp√©tences en JSON avec des d√©fis interactifs et des retours instantan√©s
description:
## Comment √ßa fonctionne

Ce mod√®le est un examen pratique con√ßu pour tester votre compr√©hension des types de donn√©es JSON fondamentaux. C'est le moyen id√©al de consolider vos connaissances apr√®s avoir appris les bases.

Consid√©rez-le comme le **"test de conduite"** qui vient apr√®s la "le√ßon th√©orique". Vous recevrez une s√©rie de t√¢ches, et le flux de travail v√©rifiera automatiquement vos r√©ponses, fournissant un retour instantan√©.

Le test est divis√© en six d√©fis s√©quentiels, chacun se concentrant sur un type de donn√©es principal :
1.  **Cha√Æne :** √âcrire correctement des valeurs textuelles.
2.  **Nombre :** Utiliser des entiers et des d√©cimales.
3.  **Bool√©en :** Travailler avec `true` et `false`.
4.  **Null :** Repr√©senter une valeur inexistante.
5.  **Tableau :** Cr√©er des listes de donn√©es ordonn√©es.
6.  **Objet :** Construire des structures cl√©-valeur imbriqu√©es.

Pour chaque d√©fi, vous modifierez un n≈ìud `Set` avec la syntaxe JSON correcte. Lorsque vous ex√©cutez le flux de travail, un n≈ìud `IF` correspondant validera votre saisie. Un chemin vert signifie que vous avez r√©ussi et pouvez passer au d√©fi suivant. Un chemin rouge signifie que vous devez r√©essayer !

## √âtapes de configuration

**Temps de configuration : < 1 minute**

Ce flux de travail est un test autonome et ne n√©cessite aucune configuration ni identifiants.

1.  Lisez les instructions sur la note autocollante principale pour comprendre l'objectif.
2.  Commencez par le premier d√©fi, **"Test - Cha√Æne"**. Activez et modifiez le n≈ìud selon les instructions sur la note autocollante violette √† c√¥t√©.
3.  Cliquez sur **"Ex√©cuter le flux de travail"**.
4.  Si le chemin d'ex√©cution est vert, vous avez r√©ussi ! Vous pouvez passer au n≈ìud "Test" suivant dans la s√©quence pour continuer. Si le chemin est rouge, lisez l'indice dans le message d'erreur et r√©essayez.
5.  R√©p√©tez le processus jusqu'√† ce que vous atteigniez le message de succ√®s final.

**Bonne chance !**

nodes.creator: Lucas Peyrin

parameters.html:
‚úî

Success!

To go further, you can

check out more templates.

parameters.content:
### Step 2: Number

Modify the **"Test - Number"** node.

**Task:** Create a JSON object with two keys:
- `product_id` with the number `12345`
- `price` with the decimal number `99.99`


![Numbers](https://media2.giphy.com/media/v1.Y2lkPTc5MGI3NjExNHE0eWdiMzg5bG4ya3U0am05MHgweGp3dXE2OWtvZGpwdng2ZzhxayZlcD12MV9pbnRlcm5hbF9naWZfYnlfaWQmY3Q9Zw/JBRR744Ozd0xLhksLw/giphy.gif)

‚ùå **Incorrect.**

**Hint:** Numbers must not be in quotes. Check both the integer and the decimal value.

### Step 3: Boolean

Modify the **"Test - Boolean"** node.

**Task:** Create a JSON object with two keys:
- `is_active` with the value `true`
- `has_permission` with the value `false`


![Boolean](https://media4.giphy.com/media/v1.Y2lkPTc5MGI3NjExYWdzOGFzY2c1enhmZmFwY2s5cmxmaDJwMm1rbXZ3b2wxYmZzcTQ5diZlcD12MV9pbnRlcm5hbF9naWZfYnlfaWQmY3Q9Zw/x2NtwIIIICGZXhDNrb/giphy.gif)

‚úÖ **Correct!**

Now for the `null` value.

‚ùå **Incorrect.**

**Hint:** Boolean values are `true` or `false` and must be written without any quotes.

parameters.errorMessage: Incorrect Boolean. Hint: Boolean values are `true` or `false` and must be written without any quotes.

parameters.content:
### Step 4: Null

Modify the **"Test - Null"** node.

**Task:** Create a JSON object with a key `middle_name` whose value is explicitly nothing, or `null`.


![Null](https://media1.giphy.com/media/v1.Y2lkPTc5MGI3NjExOXF0NG9pYWw2OXRiZGV0bTA1MGoyY3h2MXNjaWY0a2Iydjc1eHh0ZiZlcD12MV9pbnRlcm5hbF9naWZfYnlfaWQmY3Q9Zw/05dgux7TEBbY4VxAlb/giphy.gif)

‚úÖ **Correct!**

Excellent. Time for arrays.

parameters.errorMessage: Incorrect Null. Hint: The `null` value represents 'nothing' and is written as `null` without quotes.

parameters.content:
### Step 5: Array

Modify the **"Test - Array"** node.

**Task:** Create a JSON object with a key `tags` which is an array containing:
- The string `'n8n'`
- The string `'automation'`
- The number `2024`


![Array](https://media1.giphy.com/media/v1.Y2lkPWVjZjA1ZTQ3dmxsZzN2Y3o5NHRqdGk2eHRmdmoycmdiYjFqMW90eGY1c3c2aGQ3MSZlcD12MV9naWZzX3NlYXJjaCZjdD1n/Iv6s8zUIyIfnXBp6B8/200.webp)

‚úÖ **Correct!**

Almost there. Last one: objects.

‚ùå **Incorrect.**

**Hint:** Check the order of items, data types (string vs number), and the syntax: `[` `]` `,`.

parameters.errorMessage: Incorrect Array. Hint: Check the order of items, data types (string vs number), and the syntax: `[` `]` `,`.

parameters.content:
### Step 6: Object

Modify the **"Test - Object"** node.

**Task:** Create a JSON object with a key `user`. Its value should be *another object* with two keys:
- `name` (string: `'Alex'`)
- `id` (number: `987`)


![Object](https://media1.giphy.com/media/v1.Y2lkPTc5MGI3NjExZmlwNHlld3ZpbjF2eGg1Z3hndGxpN3RsMDQ5MmYyNDh6cjE1YWN3OCZlcD12MV9pbnRlcm5hbF9naWZfYnlfaWQmY3Q9Zw/AiPHa8Drgklos/giphy.gif)
‚úÖ **YOU DID IT!**

‚ùå **Incorrect.**

**Hint:** Remember to wrap the inner object in curly braces `{}` and check the data types inside it.

parameters.errorMessage: Incorrect Object. Hint: Remember to wrap the inner object in curly braces `{}` and check the data types inside it.

parameters.content:
üéâ **Congratulations! You've passed the test!**

You have successfully demonstrated your understanding of all the basic JSON data types.

You are now ready to work with data in n8n.

-- Well done! --

### Step 1: The String

Modify the **"Test - String"** node below.

**Task:** Create a JSON object with a single key named `my_string` whose value is the text `I love automation`.

‚úÖ **Correct!**

Let's move on to numbers.

‚ùå **Incorrect.**

**Hint:** A string value must always be enclosed in double quotes `" "`. Check for typos!

## JSON Knowledge Test

Welcome to the practical test! The goal is to check your understanding of the JSON concepts you've just learned.

**How to use this test:**
1.  For each step, read the instructions on the purple sticky note.
2.  Modify the corresponding **"Test - ..."** node by writing the correct JSON in the text area.
3.  Click **"Execute Workflow"** to check your answers.
4.  A green path means a correct answer, a red path means it's incorrect. Keep trying until the path turns green!


Good luck!

‚úÖ **Correct!**

Let's move on to booleans.

‚ùå **Incorrect.**

**Hint:** The `null` value represents 'nothing' and is written as `null` without quotes.

üí° **Answer Key**

This node contains the correct JSON for the **Number** step. You can use it as a reference if you get stuck.

üí° **Answer Key**

This node contains the correct JSON for the **Boolean** step. You can use it as a reference if you get stuck.

üí° **Answer Key**

This node contains the correct JSON for the **Null** step. You can use it as a reference if you get stuck.

üí° **Answer Key**

This node contains the correct JSON for the **Array** step. You can use it as a reference if you get stuck.

üí° **Answer Key**

This node contains the correct JSON for the **Object** step. You can use it as a reference if you get stuck.

parameters.errorMessage: Incorrect String. Hint: A string value must always be enclosed in double quotes `" "`. Check for typos!
Incorrect Number. Hint: Numbers must not be in quotes. Check both the integer and the decimal value.

parameters.content:
üí° **Answer Key**

This node contains the correct JSON for the **String** step. You can use it as a reference if you get stuck.

### How to pass a test
![Test Example](https://supastudio.ia2s.app/storage/v1/object/public/assets/n8n/json_test_guide.gif)

## Was this helpful? Let me know!
[![clic](https://supastudio.ia2s.app/storage/v1/object/public/assets/n8n/clic_down_lucas.gif)](https://api.ia2s.app/form/templates/academy)

I really hope this test helped you check your JSON understanding fully. Your feedback is incredibly valuable and helps me create better resources for the n8n community.

### **Have Feedback, a Question, or a Project Idea?**

I've streamlined the way we connect. It all starts with one simple form that takes less than 10 seconds. After that, you'll chat with my AI assistant who will gather the key details and pass them directly on to me.

#### ‚û°Ô∏è **[Click here to start the conversation](https://api.ia2s.app/form/templates/academy)**

Use this single link for anything you need:

*   **Give Feedback:** Share your thoughts on this template‚Äîwhether you found a typo, encountered an unexpected error, have a suggestion, or just want to say thanks!

*   **n8n Coaching:** Get personalized, one-on-one guidance to master n8n. We can work together to get you launched with confidence or help you reach an expert level.

*   **n8n Consulting:** Have a complex business challenge or need a custom workflow built from scratch? Let's partner on a powerful automation solution tailored to your specific needs.

---

Happy Automating!
Lucas Peyrin | [n8n Academy](https://n8n.ac)
[![Test Skills](https://supastudio.ia2s.app/storage/v1/object/public/assets/n8n/n8n_animation.gif)](https://n8n.io/creators/lucaspeyrin)

user.name: Lucas Peyrin
user.bio:
Innovative builder with a passion for crafting automation solutions that solve real-world challenges. From streamlining workflows to driving efficiency, my work empowers teams and individuals to achieve more with less effort. Experienced in developing scalable tools and strategies that deliver results with n8n, supabase and cline.

Join the N8N Academy:

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
